good old fashioned reality bending fun
Improved on the original. Must play.
Il restera dans les classiques à absolument joué !
this is a very interesting game with a lot of story with lots of turns

love it! 
the cake is a lie though
It's SOOOO good and maybe some people (who don't like puzzles) won't like it buts it's good.

Portal 2 is really fun! If you somehow haven't bought it yet go ahead and buy it now.


Update: It's still as fun as ever!
it's my favourite game but sadly i can't play it anymore because 32-bit games aren't supported on macOS 10.15 anymore
Could possibly be the greatest game in existence

Es gibt kein Spiel wo ich mir so sehr ein dritten teil wünsche wie bei Portal 2. I Love it 
ich denke das sagt schon alles but the cake is a lie
Un juego entretenido y clásico. Te hará pensar y no resulta demasiado frustrante. De rebajas es una adquisición más que recomendable
This game is very cool. Recommended.
amazing game, i played it nonstop and am planning on playing in again 11/10

Are you a puzzle fanatic ?
Can't you sleep without making at least a puzzle per day?
God damn it, then you're in the right place !
Portal 2, an awesome experience that you can have it alone or co-op with a friend.
I don't want to talk that much about the first game because I believe that many played this first then maybe some tried playing the first game too after that.
So, this game is actually amazing, its unique, every level puts your mind on thinking and some of them actually are so damn simple and then you're something like "how I couldn't see that?" , what I'm saying is, this game puts you to think too much when in the end, you just to see outside the box (literally).
So, at the coop story, gosh, you won't believe it how much fun can it be, trust me, mostly when you can troll or get trolled, also you can even play maps from other fans, co-op or solo, so...what are you waiting for?
This game is so great! It's funny, story-rich and challenging (but not too challenging)! Would totally recommend for everyone, even if you haven't played the first game!
bu oyunu oynamadıysan çok şey kaybediyorsun.
One of the greatest games I've ever played.
ce jeu est tout plein de mystères et de SF ainsi que de l'apocalypse
uzun saatler boyunca oyanabileceğiniz ve zeka geliştirici bir oyun

ÇOK EĞLENDİM
 Atmosferi çok iyiydi oyunun içinde gibiydim. Bilgisayarımın kötü olmasına rağmen oyunu hiç kasmadan oynadım grafikleri nefsi ferahlatmayan iç karartmayan bir şekildeydi.Savaş oyunlarından bıkıp geldiğim ikinci adres. Maalesef, ben tek başıma bitiridim ama buna rağmen oynarken çok eğlendim. Oynamanızı KESİNLİKLE tavsiye ediyorum. Şimdiden iyi eğlenceler.
Cool game that doesn't include shooting for a change

Muito bom o modo história!
Os mapas em dupla tb são muito bons, envolvendo muito raciocínio e comunicação!
Mapas criados pela comunidade tb possuem muitas possibilidades, gostei bastante!
Hippy hoppy buy the game and its your property. (Very good Game)
Portal 2 est un très bon jeu malgres les quelques bugs graphiques/ de collision mais il n'y a rien de majeur.
One of  the best games I've played. Only wish it was longer...
Hob yukarı açam hob şuraya açam... Eee bölümü nasıl geçiyoz hemen Youtube'ye başvuruyoruz arkadaşlarrr.

Muy buen juego y super recomendado jugar al primero antes de este, para entender un poco mejor la historia y tal. Lo único malo es que las pantallas de carga le quitan la tensión en muchas partes, por el resto juegaso que todo el mundo debería jugar

[h2]Teleportacja[/h2]

[b]Plusy:[/b]
[b]+ [/b]Innowacyjny system. Nigdy nie spotkasz innej gry z takim ciekawym systemem;
[b]+ [/b]Grafika jest bardzo przyjemna;
[b]+ [/b]Udźwiękowienie jak najbardziej na plus;
[b]+ [/b]Rozbudowane lokacje i ciekawe zagadki;
[b]+ [/b]Granie w coopa sprawia frajdęl;

Originelles Spiel, spannende Story und tolle Charaktere. Fast 10 Jahre alt und immer noch genial.
Fabuła była bardzo dobra. Mechanika gry jest bardzo dopracowana. Z czasem gry podnosi się trudność gry. Polecam bardzo serdecznie.

すごく面白かった。評判が良かったので買ってずっと放置してましたがストーリーも面白かったしラストもすごくかっこよかった、基本はパズルゲームで時間制限もアスレチック要素もないのでのんびりと楽しめました。
